name: Add new Digistore24 etickets to Google Sheets
description: Every time a new eticket has been created in Digistore24, Make will automatically add the information about customer and eticket to a specified spreadsheet in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SgxSQ_tWbiwgHQGdfZPukeelxfSDUvLAHiyp9spJU2A/edit?usp=sharing).
